attributes.action: Make it a pre-requisite for employers to have the courtesy to reply to every applicant that applys for a job regardless of success or failure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems there is no courtesy these days when people apply for jobs and do not get a response back. It does not take five seconds to write a standard letter back to the person and tell them yes or no - without the applicant having to wait ages just to get a response.
